scripts.pretest: npm explore plugins -- gulp | webpack --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.test-init: echo npm run pretest && tests/test-in-vm.sh tests/build/tests/initial-load-test.js
scripts.test-plugins: echo npm run pretest && tests/test-in-vm.sh tests/build/tests/plugins/plugin-test.js
scripts.test-plugins-debug: echo not yet working npm run pretest && tests/plugins/test-in-vm.sh -d tests/build/tests/plugins/plugin-test.js
scripts.test-plugins-watch: when-changed -k -1 -s tests/plugins/*.ts src/plugins/* -c npm run test-plugins
scripts.test-plugins-debug-watch: echo not yet working when-changed -k 1 -s tests/plugins/*.ts src/plugins* -c npm run test-plugins-debug
scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.dev.js --progress && npm explore lipsurf-plugins -- npm run build
scripts.watch: npm explore lipsurf-plugins -- npm run watch | webpack --config webpack.dev.js --watch --progress
scripts.build-prod: webpack --verbose --config webpack.prod.js --display verbose && npm explore lipsurf-plugins -- npm run build-prod
scripts.watch-prod: npm explore lipsurf-plugins -- npm run watch-prod | webpack --config webpack.prod.js --watch
scripts.release: npm run build-prod && rm lipsurf.zip; zip -r lipsurf.zip chrome-extension/
